subject: Islam
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: During Ramadan, Hamza Abdullah of the Denver Broncos ate a hearty meal before dawn and then did not touch food or drink again until sunset — no matter how difficult practice turned out to be.
snippet: During Ramadan, Hamza Abdullah of the Denver Broncos ate a hearty meal before dawn and then did not touch food or drink again until sunset — no matter how difficult practice turned out to be.
